author: potuz
content: head looks good merged, no trivial payloads and no forks

author: potuz
content: we're finalizing people, I already have the u_justification for this epoch! congratulations to all

author: vorot93
content: Now that the merge has finalized, can we please agree to replace TTD with transition block number everywhere?

author: vorot93
content: it's simpler and TTD imo doesn't make much sense outside PoW

author: sky.cactus
content: Eventually I think we should do block number&hash.

author: timbeiko
content:

author: potuz
content: Is it only demand? base_fee is considerably higher than a few days ago. Since transactions now take longer to be included I wonder if this could mess slightly up this

author: potuz
content: Or people now feel safer about using the network

author: ansgar.eth
content: I think there has been a burst of activity following the merge, driving up the base fee.

author: timbeiko
content:
Heads up for folks not on ACD today - we agreed to pause calls after next week's CL call (Sept 22, 14:00 UTC) until ACD on Oct 27 (14:00 UTC), except if something urgent comes up. 

In the meantime, we'll try and make progress on discussing the technicals of Shangai EIP candidates async, and have optional #party-lounge hangs at our regular ACD/CL time weekly. 

I've drafted what this can look like here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/shanghai-core-eip-consideration/10777 - will tweak it a bit in the next few days based on the conversations on the call today. 

We'll also have an EthMagicians session to discuss the roadmap with the community at devcon: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/ethereum-magicians-protocol-roadmap-gathering-devcon-vi/10866
